headline: Romney rips GOP censure effort against Cheney, Kinzinger
author: Sarakshi Rai
sentences: Romney, a leading critic of former President Trump within the Senate GOP conference, signaled his support for Cheney and Kinzinger, also both prominent Trump critics, and said in a tweet that "shame falls on a party that would censure persons of conscience, who seek truth in the face of vitriol."
